website_summaries.verdict: American Fist’s set of boxing reflex balls are sturdily constructed, simple to use, comfortable to wear, and engaging to master.
pros: Features 4 ball types for 4 difficulty levels
Includes a pair of premium protective hand wraps, manual, and carrying bag
cons: A little pricey, but it’s a premium set

customer_reviews.title: Fun and challenging
customer_reviews.text: This is a fun exercise to do for testing reflexes. I have never used anything like it! We got a lot of laughs (it turns out my boyfriend and I don’t have the best reflexes). I really loved that it came with hand wraps and most importantly, a step by step guide on how to wrap your hands. The varying weights and material of the balls keeps things interesting. The only critique I have it that the string connecting the ball to the headband is pretty long and while it was still usable, I wish it was adjustable.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Osborn

customer_reviews.title: Hand eye coordination
customer_reviews.text: Improved my hand eye coordination immensely. it shows now whenever I go to the tennis club at my local YMCA. I've been crushing every set that I've played in the last couple of months since I started using the reflex balls. I started at the "newbie" ball and have been able to work my way to "boxer." Another couple of weeks I'll be at the "beast mode ball's" doorstep knocking, or boxing, down every one of my limits.
customer_reviews.author: Martha Dunlap

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed with reflex balls in general
customer_reviews.text: Ehh, first one I’ve ever had but I don’t use it much. Not the best boxing item in general imo. But might work great for someone else. Company is great and customer service is great. I wouldn’t hesitate to order again from this company despite not being blown away with reflex ball. It was my first and didn’t know what to expect. I like fighting, not reflex balls lol.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Ford

customer_reviews.title: Not just for boxers
customer_reviews.text: This is a good item to develop your coordination and fast reaction. Its hard at the beginning, because you're getting punched, but its getting better with practice. The wraps (not elastic) help you to get a flatter surface on yout fist, so you can control the direction of the ball.
customer_reviews.author: AK

customer_reviews.title: Does its job
customer_reviews.text: Product works well and I love the fact that there are 4 different difficulties to choose from. I wanted to start boxing but I was scared to be judged in the boxing gyms so I decided to buy this product and practice on my own so I do not go to a gym and embarrass myself right away. It is a great little workout during the day and I feel myself getting better with each passing session.
customer_reviews.author: Amber sarkar

customer_reviews.title: No "lobster locks" included in order
customer_reviews.text: A key component to this working is the "lobster locks" and there were NONE included in my order, I don't want to deal with returning this, and don't know how to go about getting them.
customer_reviews.author: T. Kanaley

customer_reviews.title: Fun and effective.
customer_reviews.text: Very fun and although I was skeptical at first, these things work great for reflex training in addition to hand-eye coordination. If you're not a very activer person, they are also great for stamina but more active people will just find it to be a warm-up. The different difficulty balls and adjustable elastic ropes make it possible for people of all ages and sizes to enjoy.. The headband is very high quality and so it the carrying/storage bag. The bonus handwraps are high-quality aswell, not some cheap throw-away ones.
customer_reviews.author: BuyToReview

customer_reviews.title: Great Easy Exercise
customer_reviews.text: This is a great item!! I bought it to help with my strength and dexterity. I have MS and experience alot of weakness in my extremities. This is an easy exercise to help with my arms. Although I don't suffer from cognitive function I think it helps with that as well ( Hand/Eye coordination). It's made well and I am happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Christie

customer_reviews.title: Challenging and fun...
customer_reviews.text: Comes with four levels of difficult (four different balls of different weights) that can become challenging very quickly. Easy to assemble and swap out balls, certainly a lot of fun for the money. As more of a heavy bag guy, this is quite a change of pace!
customer_reviews.author: D. Ross

customer_reviews.title: Amazing  reflex ball!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best Christmas gift i could have bought for my son who is 8 and very athletic!!! He asked me why he didn’t already have one! Product came exactly as described and nicely packaged! The metal hooks were wrapped with the blue ball, so at first glance it can appear they aren’t there, but they are! Instructions were included, make sure to cut the string as instructions say. Hours and hours of fun. People aged 8 to 60+ enjoyed this at our Christmas gathering. I am going to buy one for myself too. Wonderful, worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really?
customer_reviews.text: Not even the product I ordered and it's made in China
customer_reviews.author: Snakes1982

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made junk. Like a toy you'd get at an amusement park with 50 tickets
customer_reviews.text: This thing is unbelievably cheaply made with this flimsy elastic string thing like the one that comes on those paddle ball toys you get for $1 at the dollar store. The string attaches to the handband with a little piece of velcro. It would probably break in 1 day. Returning this garbage which should never have been made.
customer_reviews.author: Regular guy

customer_reviews.title: Fun and quick
customer_reviews.text: the elastic is very thin, and very quick. this is great practice for eye hand coordination, but not great for punching technique. naturally the ball being connected to the forehead, the punch angle will be to match the ball flight (from the center face straight out) instead of from the shoulder to the target. But great for fun and fitness...
customer_reviews.author: myke

customer_reviews.title: Good for Beginners
customer_reviews.text: My second purchase for a reflex ball and I wished I bought this first. The 4 different levels of difficulty is the seller. Because you can switch whenever you want to adjust to your needs. The slip band is nice too, just recommend washing after every use, can breakout (no brainer right). Just need to make sure you tie the knots on properly or else the objects can fly off and the whiplash of the elastic can sting quite a bit. As long as you know that the elastic or ball can and will hit your eye/face to time to time. Then this is perfect! It’s fun and challenging. I thoroughly enjoy it for a nice little cardio and coordination
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Fun but tricky
customer_reviews.text: First, I thought the lobster locks were missing from my order as well but after contacting manufacturer, it turns out they were in the bag with the blue (veteran) tennis ball. Second, I've only tried the black (novice) one and it definitely became easier once I trimmed the string to a shorter length. Kind of fun once you get going and get several hits in a row but it's tricky. I think wearing some type of light boxing glove would make it easier because if you go bare knuckle like me, your bones and such send the ball in all sorts of different directions. I'll keep trying it some more and maybe wrap my hands next time.
customer_reviews.author: rockowise

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Package comes with 4 balls with different hardness which is great because it took me time with my hand eye coordination. Balls come with a long string that allows you to change length so you can adjust it.
customer_reviews.author: Sophia

customer_reviews.title: Way too small
customer_reviews.text: This product is clearly made for either children or people with very small heads. It was so tight, even at the minimum amount of tension to keep it on, I could not wear it for a moment without a headache. I had a friend who is about 5'6 and a small frame try it and it was too small for him as well. Since I have opened the headband and red ball I assume I can't send it back because it is useless to me. I would absolutely not recommend to anyone unless this is meant as a gift to a small child.
customer_reviews.author: C. Chaney

customer_reviews.title: Lost a couple of pounds
customer_reviews.text: It has gotten me to lose a couple of pounds which I thought was impossible. I'd gone to my allergist to see what foods I needed to cut back and he recommended that in addition to avoiding certain foods, I'd start using some home exercise equipment to get the ball rolling on my weight loss. I lost eight pounds after I started listening to her advice and actually using the balls while also cutting back on certain foods.
customer_reviews.author: Krystle Edgerton

customer_reviews.title: Missing lobster hooks
customer_reviews.text: Really like this product I've had it for Lee's than a week and already noticed a difference I do have 2 problems First problem is the lobster hooks did not come with the order so I had to tie the to the head strap Looking for a phone number to talk to someone but could not find one I would just like the lobster hooks sent I would rather not return to whole product
customer_reviews.author: Js

customer_reviews.title: Good deal in Addition with HandWrap that’s Included
customer_reviews.text: I bought this boxing headgear set , After I owned another pair that unfortunately got lost in the gym. In Comparison to the other pair I had this one offeres a good beginner Level to Individuals just starting out or trying to get back in shape. The quality is alright but I can see that soon the section we string is attached to ball is getting loose and will end in a tragic way lol. If anyone is interested the other set I had was Lomochenko Boxing Headband.
customer_reviews.author: Dean Datuashvili

customer_reviews.title: I'm having so much fun with this
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for just fun, and totally loving it! It's pretty hard to hit the ball every time, but it takes some time to get used to it. overall it's great for free time, workout, or practice for your boxing skills if you're into boxing. Fun to use!
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Great exercise and so much fun!
customer_reviews.text: Ended up ordering a second set because the rest of the family wanted to join in. Great exercise, it's pretty much a game and excellent for improving hand eye coordination as well. Didn't really notice a difference between the red and black foam balls but certainly the tennis ball and racket ball is a higher skill level. Recommend wearing gloves for protection on the denser balls.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy M.

customer_reviews.title: Great AND/BUT WISH FOR MORE
customer_reviews.text: Research regarding sport/exercise equipment show that more than 90% of the equipments purchases do not get reused. This thing here is part of the 10% and will be for yourself as well. It is for one different, too it’s a cardio and focus and skills at the same time. Considering the cost if it it is really really great two pitfalls what not to be taken against the seller, one that the hand wraps could be longer, and two the balls levels eventually gets boring. so if I was the seller I will create more balls with advanced levels and upsell it that way.
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: Lobster claws rings missing ?
customer_reviews.text: I liked the product but was missing the lobsters claw connect rings , tried twice both orders the rings were issuing. A key component for operation.
customer_reviews.author: Robert M. norman

customer_reviews.title: Super quality
customer_reviews.text: I just received this product, and I was very pleasantly surprised by the quality of it. For the price I thought it would be something flimsy, but this is high-quality and should last a long time. This will not make you a boxer or a martial artist, however it will significantly improve your hand eye coordination which will benefit you in many different endeavors including boxing and martial arts.
customer_reviews.author: George Louisville Kentucky

customer_reviews.title: Improved My Reflexes
customer_reviews.text: I started incorporating this headband into my daily workout and not only is it stimulating, but it indeed improved my reflexes. I break sweat and the other balls offer a more challenging workout. I love this product, whether you want to have a quick workout or want to master your boxing skills, this is an investment. I highly recommend this set for newbies and veterans.
customer_reviews.author: Whitley Sobotka

customer_reviews.title: Good product and value
customer_reviews.text: Got this set a few days ago. It was an upgrade from the first one I ever had... 4 diff difficulties (ball types) up from 2 Better and more comfortable head band and hand bandages. So far I have been using the veteran ball (diff #2) and the difference is quite appreciable. This is so far, a good product and I am happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Novelty Item
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking to improve your reflex, you're better off doing something else. I find this to be more of a novelty item to have people laugh at or you can laugh at people at their expense. It's basically a headband with an elastic string tied to a ball. That's all it is. There's no videos on how to use linked in the instructions. Just "Here you go, have fun!" instructions. Don't even bother with it unless you just want to have fun laughing.
customer_reviews.author: Boom

customer_reviews.title: A fun way to build hand eye coordination
customer_reviews.text: While I'm no expert, I don't know if this will make you a much better fighter, its a really fun way to pass the time. You won't get a workout from this so if you saw this as a speed-bag side-grade your barking up the wrong tree. It's frustrating at first but you eventually master it and its very satisfying once you do.
customer_reviews.author: James G. Morris

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: The lobster locks were missing so the item is useless!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Danger: Adult supervision with kids.
customer_reviews.text: Yesterday the string went wacky and wrapped around my granddaughters finger on its way back from a punch. It’s wrapped around so tight and fast that my daughter had to use a fingernail clipper to cut the cord as my granddaughters finger was turning black from no circulation. Please be careful, could have been her neck. We through the whole device away.
customer_reviews.author: Shiela Hebert

customer_reviews.title: Holds up well.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this reflex ball! I have tried several different versions of this and they break fairly easily, but I’ve been using this one for 15-20 minutes a day and it’s held up pretty well. I am still using the beginner level one and have tried the others but they are definitely more difficult. I enjoy this item and it’s a great deal!
customer_reviews.author: Allen

customer_reviews.title: Nice product, works great. Good buy.
customer_reviews.text: They're are many others on here, this is the best one I found, though. It comes with 4 different balls. This has an adjustable head band with thin rubber lining inside the head band for grip. The head band feels good and sturdy. Nothing feels cheap. It's fun & improves your accuracy, for sure.
customer_reviews.author: TJames44

customer_reviews.title: Did not come with lobster locks or user manual
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this product for my daughter on November 26th. opened it today December 7th because my daughter was going to use it for the first time and it did not come with the lobster claps or the users manual which makes this product useless I'm so disappointed now was looking forward to seeing her get her reflexes up
customer_reviews.author: FaCe tha GReaT

customer_reviews.title: Missing clips
customer_reviews.text: I’d love to be able to say this was great. Unfortunately we don’t know because the clips were missing. No clips = no play time. Did I mention it was my son’s Christmas gift. Upset kid= more upset mom. We also didn’t get the storage bag. Less upset about the bag, but yea
customer_reviews.author: Erica Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: The reflex balls are great. They are super durable. I was worried the string would pop when hit hard but I have had a for a year now maybe and only had to repurchase because I lost it when we moved. I use them a lot and my family loves to use them as well!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Guts

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this setup! It's a little difficult to get used to at first, but as long as you start with the easiest level and start with small punches, (think to tap it with your fists) until you get the rhythm, you should progress quickly. After just under a week, I've progressed to the next level. The headband adjusts well, it fits me without issue and I have a pretty small head. The material for the balls is soft and spongy so while it can come back and hit you, it's soft enough that it doesn't hurt.
customer_reviews.author: jelani sanchez lueje

customer_reviews.title: Nice for it’s intended purpose
customer_reviews.text: Item came on time and was packaged well. The directions are simple and the product itself is easy to use. One knock that I have is that the latches from the headband to ball string are Velcro and not metal as described. I’ll be monitoring to see how long the Velcro holds up. Really helps with hand eye coordination and can become addictive once getting in a rhythm.
customer_reviews.author: Snow J

customer_reviews.title: Works great but 1 issue
customer_reviews.text: Only issue is the balls in particular with a white elastic cord. The white cords flails around wildly while in use and it's distracting visually so makes it very hard to hit the ball. Not an issue with the black elastic, they should all be black. Unable to easily replace the cord as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Voigtmann

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 2 both were missing the connectors making them useless.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Mcvicker

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product. In all honesty it should only feature 3 balls. The red ball with white string is a trickster. I avoid it completely. The tennis ball will be your bestfriend and worst enemy. Don't let it pop you in the face. You guys are going to make me a wealthy man with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: the item is good but I do not like it
customer_reviews.text: It is too hard to play with. I really cannot have fun with it. I played only one time when I receive it and leave it somewhere. Then I totally forgot about it and miss the return deadline. It is just a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Vault408

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners
customer_reviews.text: I like this product. It's easy to use, even for beginners. It's also safe- my daughter uses it too. You can probably make something similar for a few dollars less with a tennis ball, some elastic string, and either a headband or a hat of some kind (at first I was thinking about making something like this) but for the time and money you'd invest, and for the material of the balls in the set, with the ability to increase the difficulty level I would recommend spending the few extra dollars on this product, especially for beginners.
customer_reviews.author: Lonnie Pamer

customer_reviews.title: Great for handeye coordination!
customer_reviews.text: I love this for improving my hand eye coordination. It is more difficult than it looks, but it is easy to improve. Yes, I can tell my handeye coordination has gotten better since I started using this.
customer_reviews.author: KfillyTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Missing Parts
customer_reviews.text: It was obviously a used/opened item. The instructions were wrinkled, some of the items were wrapped and some were loose, and the 4 lobster locks were missing. I’m updating my review. It did appear to have been open but the locks weren’t missing, they were just so small I over looked them. Once assembled it was as advertised so I’m changing my original review.
customer_reviews.author: andre mhoon

customer_reviews.title: I've bought a few of these boxing balls before but this one is the best!
customer_reviews.text: I got this boxing head ball on a Thursday. Then on Friday, I started playing with it. I maxed out at about 20 in a row for my first night. Then about 100 the next night. My only mistake was doing this so for so long I injured my right shoulder considering my body wasn't prepared for 3 hours of this and I always overdo it with physical exertion. Icing my shoulder for a few days and can't wait to hop back into it. I have limited boxing experience but I just put my earbuds in and do this and my mind and body can relax. I'd recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Garner

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: This is so much fun. I never knew my hand eye coordination was so off til I tried this. After a few days of working at it I am getting better and hitting the ball more then not. I also love that it has different balls for different levels
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Great Starter
customer_reviews.text: Just purchased this for my son and his friend, it is very entertaining and proactive. He gets a great use out of this head band. It comes with four different balls that correlate with different levels of difficulty. Through practicing I can see the progress in his hand-eye coordination. It is a great product. Practicing self-defense at a great price is well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: sanjiv Abreu

customer_reviews.title: Great way to practice eye-hand coordination.
customer_reviews.text: If you can tie a quick release knot, (google it) you will not have any trouble switching out the different balls. Oh, and wear some eye protection. The string poked my eye somehow. I'm ok...
customer_reviews.author: Care 2

customer_reviews.title: Love the handwraps!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my husband because he's really into boxing. I started using it myself. Let's just say that my husband makes it look easy, but once you grasp the concept. It's good if you like doing small workouts at home. Overall excellent quality and durability.
customer_reviews.author: Starlena Frazier

customer_reviews.title: Fun and entertaining
customer_reviews.text: I like this product a lot, but have only used twice since purchase. The first day I tried punching the ball I could only hit a total of 4 times in a row. The second time I worked up to 36 hits. It really is good for eye hand coordination but also good for your mind. I will be using it regularly at least 3 or 4 days a week.
customer_reviews.author: terry caldwell

customer_reviews.title: No durability but fun for as long as it lasts.
customer_reviews.text: Fun and great practice for my reflexes. But a very tight, not very adjustable headband. Also, I’ve had it for a couple weeks of light use and 2 of the strings already broke off of the balls. I didn’t use the heaviest ball because of the 2 lighter balls broke I can only imagine what will happen to the heavy ball. Very disappointed. Debating a 1 but because it’s fun I gave it a 2.
customer_reviews.author: London

customer_reviews.title: Watch the first hit!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a different work out. Pretty easy to set up however not easy to jump in and start. Takes time and it’s a nice reflex exercise. Keep in mind not to cut the cord so short!
customer_reviews.author: Victor

customer_reviews.title: Home Workouts
customer_reviews.text: This is added to my husband's home work out collection. He's still finding different ways to use them; the instruction manual could have been a bit more detailed, bit there are also videos to help.
customer_reviews.author: Marthe Aspilaire

customer_reviews.title: Wrong Desription/ Version
customer_reviews.text: Boxing Reflex Ball Set, 4 Difficulty Level Training Balls On String - description states 4 ball set- only received a 2 ball set. Description is off.
customer_reviews.author: JaceB

customer_reviews.title: This is fun to use!
customer_reviews.text: It’s surprisingly fun! This thing will challenge you. I watched a lot of videos people using it and they made it look easy but for me i still need a lot of practice. It’s affordable, easy to set up and use because it has instruction. It also has hand wraps and 4 different levels of difficulty ( different balls)
customer_reviews.author: Audwin John

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for my boyfriend and he LOVES it! He brings it everywhere he goes. It didn't take him long at all to get used to. If he ever is debating going to the gym he just uses this and gets a good workout. It helps his hand eye coordination and helps him to train. You should definitely buy your boyfriend this! Kids could easily use this set as well and would have a great time while working out and improving their skills!
customer_reviews.author: Annmarie Kaplun

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My 12 and 13 year old boys use this all the time. I love it because it gets them off of their video games and gets them to improve their skills. They have fun while using this and it satisfies me to know that they are working out too. Im never scared that it will hurt them because the quality is super safe for kids. The different level balls make them set goals and they love watching each other use it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Perrin

customer_reviews.title: High Quality
customer_reviews.text: Items were shipped and arrived right away. Comfortable to wear. I gave only 3 stars for easy to use because you actually need to PRACTICE using it before it gets "easy to use". As far as easy to use set up, 5 star rating. Really nice product compared to other similar ones out there.
customer_reviews.author: Mo

customer_reviews.title: I love boxing, now I can do this at home
customer_reviews.text: I don't have always time to go to the boxing gym but I love to get my blood pumping and to enjoy while I do it. this is sweet for all levels
customer_reviews.author: shachar sharon

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my husband and he loved it. The different balls makes this product so much fun. Not only does it test your hand eye coordination but it makes you sweat. This was definitely a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, not a fitness tool
customer_reviews.text: If you want to look like a cat with a neuromuscular disorder batting around a ball on a string then this is the product for you!
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Cool product
customer_reviews.text: The tween I bought these for LOVED them. I don’t get it all but I’m no athlete like him. Great for hand-eye coordination.
customer_reviews.author: Cathleen Swift

customer_reviews.title: We love it
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to increase my hand and eye coordination for my boxing CrossFit workouts and for ping pong! At first, it was really humbling but with some practice, I got better. The product is super simple to use and it does what it supposed to. I also enjoyed watching my kids give it a try. We had so much fun!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great for the older set for Hand/Eye coordination
customer_reviews.text: Getting old. Not to fast so do not hit hard but does help with my hand eye coordination.
customer_reviews.author: TedW

customer_reviews.title: Fun for everyone at any age!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This was supposed to be new.The beginners ball had been cut.No lobster hook was included.It is a super fun toy!It is easy to use.The lobster hook allows for better play.The kids LOVE this!Great fun and exercise.Anyone can use this no matter the age. I picked up some lobster hooks at the hardware store.Cost more than this product did.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa M

customer_reviews.title: Great way to get moving
customer_reviews.text: This is so much fun for all ages. It is an amazing workout without even noticing. With practice, my hand eye coordination seems to be improving as I keep on using it. The headband fits on my head perfectly and it stays in place while being comfortable. It tests your reflexes and makes you keep punching. I use this at home while I'm watching tv and it helps me not sit down in one spot for too long.
customer_reviews.author: Casandra Lorey

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product but was willing to give it a try!
customer_reviews.text: Terrible construction and not at all what I expected. I am in fact a trainer and boxing instructor!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this
customer_reviews.text: It is so fun! It is super fun to use and once I get started it is hard to put down. It helps so many things not just boxing. It really helps me workout because it is super entertaining. I love being able to graduate from the less difficult ball to the harder ones. I can use it in basically any room. This product is really easy to get the hang of and is super easy to use. Im obsessed with it!
customer_reviews.author: Mitchel deshazer

customer_reviews.title: Favorite piece of equipment!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product!! I use it a few times a week and have been improving every single time. The quality of the different level balls are amazing. They aren't too hard so you don't have to worry about it hitting you and hurting you. You can be creative with it. I tend to mix it up with all the different levels. It is super safe for kids as well. Great to train with and just have some fun!
customer_reviews.author: Tyler akyuz

customer_reviews.title: Simple
customer_reviews.text: The directions and product itself is easy to use. This helps with hand/eye coordination. The balls are durable and the headband is easy to adjust and can fit all different head sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Lasting product and very portable
customer_reviews.text: This reflex set is amazing and definitely tests hand eye coordination. I've only had it for 2 days with about 2 hours of actual usage and already got the hang of it...the trick is the length of the string. From the headband to the belly button is the ideal length.
customer_reviews.author: Hector Roman

customer_reviews.title: The variety in the balls help with training
customer_reviews.text: I worked my way up from a newbie to a boxer ball and there definitely is a learning curve that comes with going up with every ball weight. With every increase in the difficulty of the ball, you can definitely feel the burn more and the need for faster reaction times. My upper body strength and leanness have definitely increased. overall, I'm very happy with the results.
customer_reviews.author: Junior campbell

customer_reviews.title: Wraps versus Gloves
customer_reviews.text: The wraps are nice, but I prefer using gloves. Weighting the gloves (or wearing weighted wrist weights) adds another dimension to the play.
customer_reviews.author: Il_Duro

customer_reviews.title: Fun & Effective...
customer_reviews.text: This is great exercise! I had major back surgery in June and was looking for an upper body exercise I can do without bending and lifting. This is fun, challenging and makes you sweat... thank you
customer_reviews.author: Darrell Bache

customer_reviews.title: Great for starters
customer_reviews.text: This is great for those who are interested in working on their hand and eye coordination.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Wood

customer_reviews.title: Good for reflexes.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good piece of equipment for working on reflexes.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Makes working out fun!
customer_reviews.text: Love working out with this! It makes it super fun and makes me want to work out because it makes working out entertaining. I can easily use it at home. It helps me with my hand eye coordination at the same time as getting a nice cardio workout. The string is also super long so I can adjust it when my husband uses it versus when I use it. I love this!!!
customer_reviews.author: Paul Conner

customer_reviews.title: Boxing Tools
customer_reviews.text: Excellent piece of equipment for training in the sweet science.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Pineiro

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my boxing training!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, this product is awesome. It has been helping with my accuracy and the different difficulty levels keeps me challenged. This was definitely worth the money! My only complaint would be that the headband is a bit tight but that is because I have a huge head lol.
customer_reviews.author: Luka Yoo

customer_reviews.title: Not for younger kids
customer_reviews.text: Hard to use , so it doesn't get played with
customer_reviews.author: chris taft

customer_reviews.title: Fun/Dangerous
customer_reviews.text: 4 stars because it's just so much fun, but for the love of God, wear goggles. String about took my eye out when the ball became disconnected. RETIE YOUR BALL STRING BEFORE USE. They're not attached well.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Greatly disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: Advertisement makes it look so easy to do. Don’t believe it. Need to be a pro or expert to do what the advertisers show the kid doing. It’s like a paddle ball that kids play with on your head. Kids just set them aside after trying. Wasted money. Would not order again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Great product for sharpening reflexes. And fun when your learning h it also
customer_reviews.author: liverpool 14

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: I’ve purchased a single ball before This is a good purchase for all that you receive, Ive purchased 2 for my club
customer_reviews.author: WBIFA

customer_reviews.title: The best one to buy
customer_reviews.text: This item is good for hand and eye coordination. Look out for fast returns.
customer_reviews.author: DamonTerry

customer_reviews.title: Insane workout
customer_reviews.text: It may look like just a headband, string, and a ball, but let me tell you... This is SO much more. This product gives me an insane workout each time I use it and I genuinely feel like my skills improve every time. I use it everyday and I did not regret buying it whatsoever. Just the bag can be improved.
customer_reviews.author: deddy Dzakpasu

customer_reviews.title: Good product and good service
customer_reviews.text: I really like these. I wanted to be a boxer all my life and this is helping me to get where I want to be. Not only is the product good, but the service is really good. They will cooperate with u if u have any issue. I highly recommend to anyone to buy any of their products👍🏽
customer_reviews.author: Devante Bisasor

customer_reviews.title: Great for eye/hand coordination,  and fun to use
customer_reviews.text: My 16 yr old loves it, where is it around the house constantly. Cord did snap and I catch him in the eye one time, nothing serious, but should only be used under adult supervision for younger kids
customer_reviews.author: Tanya

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This product is fun for our whole family! Our five year old even wants a turn! We loved it so much we suggested it for our nephew for Christmas. He is interested in boxing and will help him work at home.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Blackwell

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Nice thing. I often use this when I am alone at home with nothing better to do. I got this to enhance my fighting skills, heard about it helping a lot and wanted to give it a try. The string could be a bit shorter, or at least possible to adjust.
customer_reviews.author: Naimjon odriscoll

customer_reviews.title: lobster locks didn't come
customer_reviews.text: I would have rate 5 stars, if it had come all the items, no lobster locks, not even one, have to buy separate
customer_reviews.author: Rodrigo

customer_reviews.title: I am very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased this on the suggestion from a friend who has something similar. I can tell you so far that this really works. It can help you improve your moves and your eye coordination. I am very satisfied with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Dhrumil Grigoryan

customer_reviews.title: Really nice!
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice surprise! I bought this for my kid and I didn't know that is going to be that much of entertainment. He is still playing with it and it's been a while. Great toy for long winter days. I use it sometimes whenever I feel like exercising. It's a good workout for me as well.
customer_reviews.author: Maudie Kyung

customer_reviews.title: Very durable, great for agility training
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son for his birthday. He uses it multiple times a day for training, very durable, it's been since last Sept and is still going strong
customer_reviews.author: Laura Wade

customer_reviews.title: good value
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product, 15$ for hand wraps and all the balls is a steal. Took a few hours to get used to but you can make entire workouts surrounding the different difficulties of the balls included
customer_reviews.author: Kurt Mueller

customer_reviews.title: Fun and addicting
customer_reviews.text: VERY FUN AND ADDICTING! I love the product quality and affect! After 3 days of using it for about half an hour a day I already see improvements in my reflex's. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: jordan

customer_reviews.title: Great arm workout
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for a few weeks and my coordination has really improved! I started off with the softer balls in the beginning and then moved on to the solid ones. It is not easy at first and kinda scary having a ball fly towards your face, but to my surprise I got the hang of it and I get a really great arm workout!
customer_reviews.author: Tiera W

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my grandson. He likes it so much that he asked me to give a five star rating. He is nine years old and on Christmas Eve, he almost had the beginner ball rhythm figured out. Gets him away from video games for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia James

customer_reviews.title: Missing Pieces
customer_reviews.text: This item did not come with the 4 Lobster Locks as advertised. No option to contact customer service???
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Boxing Reflex Ball Set, 4 Difficulty Level Training Balls On String, Punching Fight React Head Ball with Headband, Speed Hand Eye Reaction and Coordination Boxing Equipment For Kids And Adults
product_meta.description:
Going to the gym everyday can get quite boring and mentally exhausting. Wouldn’t it be nice to find an easy way to train anywhere you want, burning calories and shaping your muscles at home? Now, you can with the amazing boxing reflex ball, a challenging training set that is so safe and easy to use that even kids can use it!

Why is this product for you?

Because it can make you more active, agile and fast. The simple headband punching ball includes everything you need for a high-intensity training in the comfort of your own home. By paying attention to the ball and punching it hard, you can train your arm muscles and improve the hand-eye coordination, reaction time and resistance.

Some of the amazing features of this product:

 * The American Fist boxing headset is an easy and effortless way for an everyday training
 * It can help you develop reaction time, agility, punching speed, fight skill and hand-eye coordination
 * Adjustable headset can be used by both adults and kids
 * 4 difficulty levels: newbie, veteran, boxer, and beast mode
 * Lobster lock for easy and fast assembling
 * Anti-slip headband design
 * Fun to use and can help you burn calories

The ultimate American Fist punching ball pack includes:

 * Anti-Slip Adjustable Headband
 * Boxing Hand Wraps
 * Velvet Carry Bag
 * User Manual
 * 4 Difficulty Levels Training Balls
 * 4 x Lobster Locks

Improve your lifestyle now with the American Fist boxing reflex ball!
feature_bullets: WHAT YOU NEED: Are you searching for a fun way to improve your reaction time, agility and your punch speed? The answer is here with the American Fist boxing reflex ball kit, a complete training set that will help you develop your arm muscles and hand-eye coordination.

4 DIFFICULTY LEVELS: The boxing speed reflex headset comes with 4 different balls corresponding to multiple difficulty levels: newbie, veteran, boxer, and beast mode. The set is portable, so you can practice your skills anywhere and anytime.

INNOVATIVE DESIGN: Why chose the American Fist punching ball training kit? Because it comes with a special headband with a premium anti-slip design that makes the set safe and easy to use. The headband can be adjusted, making this reflex punching ball set ideal for adults, kids, and even professionals.

SPECIAL BONUS: The amazing headband punching ball includes 4 lobster locks that make the entire set easy to assemble and switch between different balls. The accessories comes with a special gift: boxing/mma hand wraps that will protect you and offer a real boxer allure.

REAL BENEFITS: Using the head punching ball gear regularly will help you train your reaction time, agility, punching speed, fight skill, fitness and hand-eye coordination while providing an interesting workout that will sculpt your arm muscles.
